name: strand-model
description: Simple model component for 2 way binding to model data

attributes.name: mId
attributes.description: Model id. This is mapped to data.id when it exists.

attributes.name: cId
attributes.type: Collection id. This is assigned to models when they are used in a collection and may be used to reference them temporarily if they have not recieved a server side id.

attributes.name: collection
attributes.description: a reference to the parent collection if one is being used

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: A read-only reference to the Sync instance responsible for syncing to the server

attributes.name: defaults
attributes.description: An object hash used to pre-fill a model with data for use in repeating model scenarios.  Used in conjuction with init() method

methods.name: init
methods.description: Prefills the model with any data found in defaults object

methods.name: save
methods.description: Alias to the adapter's post() method. Used to persist data to the api.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Alias to the adapter's put() method. used to persist updates to data to apis that support it.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Alias to the adapter's get() method. Used to retrieve data from apis.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Alias to the adapter's delete() method. Used to destroy a model on apis that support it.

methods.name: get
methods.description: get a specific attribute from this model

arguments.name: property
arguments.description: The property to retrieve from the data object

arguments.name: obj
arguments.description: Optional functional argument useful for safely obtaining a.b.c data without null errors in scenarios where it is not part of a model. Defaults to instance.data

methods.name: set
methods.description: helper method to set a specific attribute's value on the data object

arguments.name: property
arguments.description: The property to set data for

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The value to save to this property

arguments.name: obj
arguments.description: Optional functional argument that allows this method to be used for objects other than this model as required.
